name: BRL-CAD

projects.project_name: Improving the k-File to BRL-CAD Converter
projects.summary: Enhancing the conversion process from k-files to BRL-CAD format for better compatibility and efficiency.

projects.project_name: Development and Build Support for Native Windows
projects.summary: Creating a robust development and build environment specifically for native Windows users of OpenSCAD.

projects.project_name: Integrated language help feature in OpenSCAD
projects.summary: Implementing a help feature within OpenSCAD that assists users with programming language syntax and functions.

projects.project_name: Create a compelling interface and functionality for the IfcOpenShell WASM / pyodide module
projects.summary: Designing an impressive interface and improving the feature set of the IfcOpenShell WebAssembly module.

projects.project_name: Authoring interface for IFC4.3 alignment geometry in Bonsai
projects.summary: Developing a user-friendly interface for authoring alignment geometry compliant with IFC4.3 standards in Bonsai.
Addressing issues related to manifold geometry in 3D models to enhance integrity and usability.
Creating algorithms to detect and remove overlapping geometries within 3D models to improve clarity and usability.

projects.project_name: Blender UI / integration with voxelisation toolkit software
projects.summary: Integrating the voxelisation toolkit with Blender's interface to create a seamless user experience.
Developing features to allow for the offsetting of 3D meshes in graphical applications.
Creating fuzz testing capabilities for algorithms in C/C++ to ensure robustness and error handling.
Creating Python bindings for BRL-CAD to enhance its accessibility and usability in Python environments.
Enhancing BRL-CAD with capabilities for editing Non-Uniform Rational B-Splines (NURBS) for better design functionality.
